text: Stráne pod Tatrami () is a village and municipality in Kežmarok District in the Prešov Region of north Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1438. It belonged to a German language island. The German population was expelled in 1945. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 700 metres and covers an area of 4.218 km² . It has a population of about 2000 inhabitants. ==Demographics== According to 2010 census total population had been 2083. In the village is sizeable Roma nationality, which had been claimed by 1078 inhabitants, which is ca. 52% of the total population. In 2010 there had been 1039 males and 1044 females, what is ca. 50% for both. ==References== ==External links== *http://stranepodtatrami.e-obce.sk Category:Villages and municipalities in Kežmarok District
title: Stráne pod Tatrami
